title: Websites won't open - Carrier Services keeps stopping
content:
Pixel 4a 5g on Verizon Prepaid

This started after latest update a few days ago. Anytime I click on a website link, I get this message saying Carrier Services keeps stopping. Then after that a few times, it doesn't do anything. Just fails to deliver link. Same thing happens with the news feed to left of home page, or trying to open a link in an email.

I tried both uninstalling the Carrier app, and uninstalling latest version. Neither helped.

Please help!!!!

Thanks!
